“我希望谁获得获胜的出价，都会感谢她。向洛杉矶的每个人发出如此多的爱，受火灾影响。”

垃圾邮政的雪莉·曼森（Shirley Manson）正在拍卖她的标志性圆点连衣裙，从“我想我偏执”音乐录影带拍卖了La Wildfire Relief的音乐视频，首先出现在NME上。

;

垃圾的雪莉·曼森（Shirley Manson）分享说，她正在拍卖她在《 La Wildfire Relief》中的“我想是偏执狂”音乐录影带中穿着的衣服。

  • 阅读更多： 垃圾的雪莉·曼森（Shirley Manson）：“我们正在从工人阶级起步和冒险者中失去乐队”

曼森的标志性黑色圆点连衣裙由非营利组织主办，为洛杉矶和朱利安的拍卖提供了一个巨大的一部分。乐队在泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift ）的“时代”巡回演唱会，查佩尔·罗恩（Chappell Roan ）的标志性'Hot to Music Video和Stage Guatt以及签名的Dave Grohl Epiphone DG-335签名电吉他上的开场插槽。

从“签订连衣裙”拍卖中进行的所有收益将用于帮助受洛杉矶野火影响的人，该野火始于1月7日，造成28人死亡，销毁了12,000多个建筑物，并强迫撤离15万名居民。

在Instagram上查看此帖子

共享的帖子垃圾 （@垃圾）

这位垃圾女主人带到了乐队的官方Instagram帐户，分享了一张照片，该照片仍来自“我认为我是偏执”视频的标题，上面写着：“我穿了这件波尔卡点，由设计师和设计师@jenniferelsster制作 - 期间 - 期间拍摄我们的视频“我认为我是偏执”。它是由传奇时尚摄影师@matthewrolstonstudio在洛杉矶的一家工作室拍摄的。这些年来，我一直把它保留在一个纸板箱中，希望她能在某个时候对某人有用。现在将近30年后，她重新开始采取行动。”

她继续说：“竞标这件衣服和其他令人惊叹的流行文化项目已经开始@Juliens_Auctions。拍卖将于2月25日结束。所有这些都将继续帮助那些受洛杉矶野火影响的人。感谢您提前的支持。我们爱你洛杉矶。”

在Instagram上查看此帖子

共享的帖子垃圾 （@垃圾）

曼森此前曾在单独的Instagram帖子中宣布捐赠这件衣服，他写道：“我真的希望它能送给一个很棒的人，一个爱我们的乐队的人。慷慨捐赠的人。我想让你知道，很难放我的衣服。这是一件事情的微小味道，但对我来说象征着很多。”

她继续说：“我希望谁获得获胜竞标的人都会感谢她。向洛杉矶的每个人发出如此多的爱，受火灾影响。感谢每个组织或参加过如此紧急帮助的人的活动和收藏的人。在这个狂野而奇妙的城市和华丽的加利福尼亚州，如此多的了不起的人和组织。 #donateifyoucan #giveafuckla””

目前对曼森礼服的竞标价格为5,000美元。您可以将您的出价放在此处，并在此处的拍卖中查看其他物品。

一项项目描述写道：“黑色和棕褐色的圆点，无肩带的肋骨迷你连衣裙，由垃圾的雪莉·曼森（Shirley Manson）在乐队的1998年音乐录影带中，用于“我想我是偏执狂”。以及曼森（Manson）手写的笔记，以及获胜的出价者，以及一个酒店Al Moudira Luxor包，并带有手写消息，上面写着“ shirley for Shirley - 来自Shirley - 带有Love X。”

在Instagram上查看此帖子

共享的帖子垃圾 （@垃圾）

在其他垃圾新闻中，Mansion以前与NME坐下来聊天，并开放了乐队与2005 LP“像我一样流血”的关系如何随着时间的推移而改变。

曼森告诉NME ：“坦率地说，直到最近，我从来没有与那张唱片有特别良好的关系。” “我们在乐队内部发生了巨大冲突的时候发布了它，并从我们的唱片公司和公众发出了兴趣。”

她补充说：“我们没有对我们感兴趣的A＆R被困。” “这真的很紧张。他们一直在推动我们与我们认为不合适的人一起工作。由于我们对此的抵抗，他们认为我们真的很困难。在娱乐行业，人们比我们更柔软得多。”

垃圾的上一张专辑《 No Gods no Masters》于2021年到达，后来在NME采访中，曼森（Manson）公开了有关该项目的巨大积极反应如何使她的感觉为即将宣布的随访而启发。

“我真的很高兴，因为我们没有任何期望。进入下一个唱片，我感到有变化。我试图抑制我的愤怒，”她解释说。

“这是一个探照灯，此唱片。灼热地球后，我们从一个带有探照灯的肮脏洞穴中出来。我们正在寻找生活和人类的碎片。”

尽管尚未宣布有关该项目的进一步详细信息，但曼森确实告诉NME ，她预测写作和录音过程将在5月底完成。

乐队将于去年参加31天的北美巡回演唱

帖子Black Keys责备管理巡回赛取消和防守加密演出的帖子首先出现在NME上。

;

黑钥匙将他们的管理层归咎于取消他们的2024年巡回演出，同时捍卫了他们参加加密演出的决定。

  • 阅读更多： Black Keys Talk返回英国及其“史诗般的”新专辑

去年四月， 乐队宣布了“国际演奏巡回赛”，以支持他们的第12张专辑“俄亥俄州玩家”，该专辑定于整个北美包括31个约会。但是， 这次旅行于5月份被报废，据推测这是由于门票销售低。

由丹·奥尔巴赫（Dan Auerbach）和帕特里克·卡尼（Patrick Carney）组成的二人组（Duo）后来宣布取消，称其被裁定并重新计划，支持较小的剧院场地。 他们还宣布，在决定之后，他们已经与他们的管理团队 - 欧文·阿佐夫（Irving Azoff）和完全停止管理的史蒂夫·莫伊尔（Steve Moir）分开。

现在，奥尔巴赫（Auerbach）和卡尼（Carney）对滚石乐队（Rolling Stone）进行了采访，他们讨论了惨败。卡尼说：“我们在这里了解到的重要的是，有多少管理公司直接连接到该国各个方面的公司。”

“从票务到晋升到管理公司，整个行业都交织在一起。但从本质上讲，作为艺术家 - 这是我们最关心的事情 - 几乎不可能谈论这个……。您正在与与另一家公司共同拥有节日的管理公司打交道。您是这些有其他利益的人的[异想天开]。”

卡尼继续说：“有一系列的连通性消除了竞争。” “我们的巡回演出，我们有大约10个[竞技场]表演并不出色。他们只是在不应该去的房间里。取消整个旅行。我们被告知……还有其他预订场所，这一切都将进入更亲密的房间，这将是很棒的。但这不是准确的。那不存在。”

在同一次采访中，二人辩护了他们决定在俄亥俄州阿克伦市举行的与加密联盟政治组织举办的俄亥俄州阿克伦活动的一场演出。

卡尼说：“这很简单：我们一年中的全部收入都损失了。” “我们为与之合作的人提供了保留者。我们得到了很多钱来播放表演，我们看到黑色彪马（Black Pumas）做了同样的事件，我们就像是“预订”。那是那个简单的兄弟。”

“当然，我们看到了所有的狗屎进来，但是就像，'你要做什么？'我们被告知这是两党的事情，”他补充说。 “就是这样。它很小。那是在我们的家乡，所以我们必须回家看看我们的人们。我肯定以前在媒体上看到了我的名字，所以这并不是什么他妈的新事物……如果我们为300人演唱音乐会将摇摆整个州的投票，那么我们有更大的他妈的问题，兄弟。透明

与@hermanosgmusic和@theheavyheavyuk一起参加精选日期，展示了No Rain No Flowers Tour的第一回合。

考克斯的客人出演了塞恩菲尔德的第五季的一集

丽莎·库德罗（Lisa Kudrow）说，后者考克斯（Courteney Cox）将“塞恩菲尔德”（Seinfeld）的技巧用于“朋友”的表演，首先出现在NME上。

;

丽莎·库德罗（Lisa Kudrow）表示，考特尼·考克斯（Courteney Cox）从她在塞恩菲尔德（Seinfeld）短暂的时间里利用她的情景喜剧知识来帮助朋友们表现更好。

  • 阅读更多： “朋友：聚会”：最好的时刻 - 他们会让您感到多大的年龄

这两个心爱的情景喜剧之间存在一些重叠，它们都围绕着纽约市的一群朋友旋转。塞恩菲尔德（Seinfeld）在1989年至1998年之间播出，当时朋友在1994年至2004年在电视上播出。

考克斯的嘉宾在剧集《妻子》中出演了前节目的第五季，扮演杰里·塞恩菲尔德（Jerry Seinfeld）的女子梅丽尔（Meryl）。

库德罗在谈到达娜·卡维（Dana Carvey）和大卫·斯佩德（David Spade）在墙上播客上的苍蝇时说，考克斯（Cox）从塞恩菲尔德（Seinfeld）传递了她的智慧“很聪明”。

“她也是我们第一次拍摄飞行员会说的那个人：'听，我做了塞恩菲尔德。他们一直在互相帮助。如果您认为我可以做一些有趣的事情，请告诉我。你必须告诉我。我们需要互相帮助。”她说。 “这定下了我们整整十年的基调。”

去年年底，库德罗（Kudrow）在华纳兄弟乐（Warner Bros.

库德罗还分享说，她在拍摄热门节目时与现场观众“烦恼”，以嘲笑不有趣的事情， 她一直在重新观看“记住”佩里的系列，后者去年去年去世了。 54岁。

在最近的其他朋友新闻中，戴维·施温默（David Schwimmer）表示，在大学时代从事临时工作时， 他曾经为罗德·斯图尔特（Rod Stewart）的离婚文件服务。

“大学一年级后的一个夏天，我只是在寻找工作，” Schwimmer在斯蒂芬·科尔伯特（Stephen Colbert）的晚会上回忆道。 “我妈妈说，'好吧，你可以成为我的过程服务器'。我妈妈是离婚律师。”

他继续说：“所以我是那个会从灌木丛中弹出并为您提供离婚文件的家伙。当时我18岁，我就像詹姆斯·邦德（James Bond）。我不是詹姆斯·邦德！ “因为您可能会在哪里。”

任何确认为Creamfields头条新闻的帖子，只有英国2025次在NME上出现在NME上。

;

任何人都被确认为今年版的Creamfields的第一个头条新闻。查看下面的详细信息。

Creamfields将于8月21日至24日在英国柴郡的Daesbury举行，意大利裔美国人DJ将在周日晚上的电子期间头条新闻。

根据新闻稿，节日的老虎机将使Matteo Milleri将他的有远见的Alter Alter Ego带入了生活，将DJ，未来主义和创造性的指导融合在一起，以制作尖端，沉浸式的体验。近年来，他的前瞻性方法重新定义了电子音乐景观，吸引了世界各地的观众。

在Instagram上查看此帖子

Creamfields共享的帖子（@CreamFieldSofficial）

最近，任何人都成为拉斯维加斯球体标题的第一位非摇滚表演者。他开创性的表演使他在场景中带来了逼真的机器人和空灵的效果图，并在Tiktok上获得了数百万次观看次数。

上个月，他宣布了他的Sphere居住期的其他新约会，又将四场表演称为“ Genesys Run结束”的“最后一场演出”。这四个日期将看到他将于2月27日，28日和3月1日和02年接管该领域。请访问此处购买门票。

任何人还宣布，每张门票出售中的5美元将捐赠给Socal Fire Fund和California Fire Foundation，以帮助一月份席卷洛杉矶的毁灭性野火。

12月28日，任何人都带出FKA树枝进行了后者的单曲“ Eusexua”的混音。为了表演，FKA Twigs演唱了现场演唱，而她的巨大渲染出现在她身后的球体内。

第二天（12月29日）， Ellie Goulding加入了任何玛利亚，以促进其合作单曲“催眠”。为了表演，当手在她的脸上移动时，Goulding的头部的巨大版本突然出现在屏幕上。您可以在此处查看两种表演的镜头。

唱片商店第2025天的发行版的完整列表已被揭示-独家乙烯基将从Oasis ， Charli XCX ， Fred等乙烯基中删除。请参阅下面的完整列表和一些最美丽的版本。

年度活动将于4月12日返回其第18版，其中数百个独家发行版本以第一个为止的英国和全球数千个独立唱片商店的首次上限提供。

山姆·芬德（Sam Fender）被确认为英国的RSD大使和邮政马龙（Post Malone） ，现在已经分享了发行版的完整列表 - 还包括Beabadoobee ， Rachel Chinouriri ，Rachel Chinouriri， Fuserited Man ，英语老师， Lil Uzi Vert，Lil Uzi Vert ， Megan Thee Stallion，Thee thee Stallion，Theee Stallion，Theee Stallion，Thee thee Stallion， MJ Lenderman和Post Malone ，以及包括公共图像有限公司， Lou Reed ，耶稣和玛丽连锁店等传奇人物。

绿洲是名单上的另一个大牌，为他们的巨大聚会年份热身，并获得了最佳收藏的“ Time Flies…（1994-2009）”，这是Vinyl上首次使用Remastered Audio和全新的包装，并带有盒子套装已编号，包括四个彩色唱片。

诺埃尔·加拉格尔（Noel Gallagher ）说：“当我长大时，唱片店真的很重要。” “这是我的DNA中的东西。我认为，如果我们可以尽可能长时间地开放唱片商店，我们应归功于这个国家的年轻人。”

Fred宣布在RSD 2025上首次在乙烯基上发布“实际生活”钢琴现场会议。我最喜欢做的事情。

“但是我们只为'Al2'和'Al3'创造了钢琴的生活几周前记录了实际生活1'钢琴。我们正在Wit Vinyl Factory（他们做了所有其他IRL乙烯基）生产真正特别的东西。”

列表中的其他亮点包括泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift “第一天使”的光盘，lou Reed的经典“金属机器”的双银色唱片，金和白色乙烯基上的蜂箱“霸王龙蜂巢”，还有12张“演示”和Air's Seminal's Siminal'Moon Safari'的演示和现场曲目。

RSD在2024年之后的回报率看到乙烯基和物理记录销售额达到20年，尽管“ 地表之下，大多数英国艺术家的收入远低于平均工资”（如FAC报告）。

尽管如此，最近的一份数字娱乐和零售协会报告显示，去年乙烯基记录的市场增长了10.5％，去年售出了670万光盘，产生了1,900万英镑。唱片商店日加上泰勒·斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的“折磨诗人”的发行，这是2024年30年前每周最高的乙烯基销售。

“每年，我都会问，'什么是唱片商店的日子？'”爱丁堡索恩唱片公司的马克·索恩（Mark Thorne）说。 “我的回答总是，'这就像唱片店的母亲节' - 但我们独立唱片零售商的队列不仅是巧克力和鲜花

“这近20年来一直促进我们行业的一部分，很长一段时间都可以持续。”

查看到目前为止宣布的唱片商店第2025天的完整列表，并在此处访问此处以获取有关RSD的更多信息或查找您最近的参与商店。

; 'The Trip' is returning – and we found out because Steve Coogan was caught speeding https://www.nme.com/news/tv/the-trip-is-returning-and-we-found-out-because-steve-coogan-was-caught-speeding-3835661?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=the-trip-is-returning-and-we-found-out-because-steve-coogan-was-caught-speedingVictoria Luxford Thu, 06 Feb 2025 17:00:16 +0000 NewsTV News https://www.nme.com/?p=3835661

It was previously thought the show wouldn't be coming back

The post 'The Trip' is returning – and we found out because Steve Coogan was caught speeding appeared first on NME .

;

Steve Coogan has revealed there is a planned fifth series of the comedy The Trip in an unusual fashion, via a letter to Birmingham Magistrates Court.

  • READ MORE: Soundtrack Of My Life – Alan Partridge

The star was caught speeding at 97mph in July 2024 and was found to already have six penalty points on his licence. The infraction would potentially have seen him given a driving ban, and the Alan Partridge creator pled to authorities for lenience.

In the letter, first reported by The Standard , Coogan wrote: “I have a series of important film commitments scheduled for 2025, many of which involve driving as a central component of the work. I am due to appear in a well-established TV series called The Trip (with Rob Brydon), which as the title suggests requires me to drive”.

The letter revealed that filming is scheduled for “towards the end of June 2025” with Coogan saying: “If I were unable to drive, the production would likely be unable to proceed”. He argued that aside from his own work, “the many individuals dependent on these productions for work” would be affected.

He explained: “These include camera, sound, and lighting technicians, riggers, and others on modest wages who would face cancellations and financial hardship, as rescheduling such projects is often highly complicated”.

The report says Coogan “entered a guilty plea and was handed five penalty points, leaving him one point short of facing a ban. He was ordered to pay a £2,500 fine, plus £90 costs and a £1,000 victim surcharge”.

This news will come as a surprise to fans, who had been told by the show's director Michael Winterbottom as recently as last year that no continuation was planned. In an interview with NME , he remarked : “I don't think any more Trips. Steve and Rob were always keen on America but it's too big! I think it'd be better to go smaller.威尔士为罗布！ But no, there's no more Trips”.

This came in spite of Coogan himself saying he'd like to do one more series of the comedy travelogue on co-star Rob Brydon's podcast.他说：“我认为肯定会有更多的话要说，因为中年不同于变老。” “I think we should do another one, at a time and place to be determined”.

NME has reached out to Sky, broadcasters of the show in the UK, for comment.

The forthcoming series won't be the only hit Coogan is bringing back, as the actor revealed the new name and serious subject matter of the new Alan Partridge show.

The post 'The Trip' is returning – and we found out because Steve Coogan was caught speeding appeared first on NME .

; 新的“蓝精灵”电影预告片承诺新的蕾哈娜音乐https://www.nme.com/news/music/new-smurfs-movie-trailer-promises-new-rihanna-music-3835717?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=new-smurfs-movie-trailer-promises-new-rihanna-musicLiberty Dunworth Thu, 06 Feb 2025 16:51:45 +0000 Film NewsMusic NewsNewsPopR&B https://www.nme.com/?p=3835717

It also sees her perform a cover of the 1987 pop classic 'Heaven Is A Place On Earth'

The post New 'Smurfs' movie trailer promises new Rihanna music appeared first on NME .

;

A trailer for the new Smurfs movie has dropped, and it seems to promise new music from Rihanna .在下面查看。

  • READ MORE: Rihanna: every album ranked and rated

Shared today (February 5), the new teaser comes following the news in 2023 that the pop star would be taking on the role of Smurfette in the upcoming blockbuster.

Before the trailer begins, Rihanna is seen speaking to the camera, introducing herself and her role in the film and telling viewers that she “can't wait” for them to watch it in cinemas over the summer.

From there, it kicks off with a mash-up of the original Smurfs theme song and the early Rihanna hit song 'Don't Stop The Music', before transitioning into a Rihanna cover of the 1987 pop classic 'Heaven Is A Place On Earth' by Belinda Carlisle. The latter also seems to feature an appearance from DJ Khaled .

“In Smurf village, every day is a party,” Ri says in the voiceover. “Every Smurf has a job — like Grouchy, Influencer, and me, the coolest Smurf in the whole village.”

According to the trailer, the plot seems to be centred around a number of Smurfs embarking on a long journey into different dimensions to find the missing Papa Smurf – voiced by John Goodman. Other actors contributing their voices to the film include Nick Offerman, Natasha Lyonne, Nick Kroll, James Corden and Amy Sedaris.

It is set to arrive in cinemas on July 18. Check out the trailer below.

As well as taking on one of the leading roles in the film and providing music for the trailer, it looks like Rihanna will also be using the blockbuster to drop some long-awaited new material.

According to a report from Variety , Rihanna is one of the producers of the movie and has also written multiple original songs for it.

More details about the new tracks are expected to be shared closer to the film's release date.

The trailer and hopes for new music comes just days after the singer took to social media to celebrate nine years since the release of her last studio album, 'Anti' .从那以后，她还没有发行另一张专辑，但继续播放两首独立歌曲。 The most recent of which was the 2022 song 'Lift Me Up' – the lead track to the Black Panther: Wakanda Forever soundtrack and a tribute to late actor Chadwick Boseman .

Fans have been anticipating a new LP – currently dubbed 'R9' by fans – since 2018, when the singer started dropping hints. These included a lighthearted post of a dog dancing alongside the caption: “Me listening to R9 by myself and refusing to release it.”

While hopes were high in 2019, the following year she dismissed them by telling fans to stop asking her to release new material during the pandemic . By 2023, Entertainment Tonight claimed that Rihanna was planning her musical return by signing a deal with Live Nation and looking to go on a world tour from 2024-2025 . This has yet to materialise.

By December 2023, Rihanna fanned the flames from ET and told a reporter on a red carpet that there may be new music and a world tour on the horizon . Once again, this lost momentum just two months later when her partner A$AP Rocky said that the singer was still “working on” the long-awaited record.

Although Ri has kept her cards close to her chest about new music, she did recently address her future in the music industry at a Fenty launch party, explaining that the long holdup for new material comes because “God had other plans for me.”

The forthcoming role in the Smurfs film will be far from her first acting role, as she has already starred in projects including Battleship , Home and Ocean's 8 .

The post New 'Smurfs' movie trailer promises new Rihanna music appeared first on NME .

; Mumford & Sons announce intimate 2025 nine-date club tour of UK, Europe, Australia and North America https://www.nme.com/news/music/mumford-sons-intimate-2025-club-tour-uk-europe-australia-north-america-buy-tickets-3835687?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=mumford-sons-intimate-2025-club-tour-uk-europe-australia-north-america-buy-ticketsAnagricel Duran Thu, 06 Feb 2025 16:49:56 +0000 Music NewsNewsFolkIndieLive Music NewsRock https://www.nme.com/?p=3835687

The shows come ahead of the release of the band's album 'RUSHMERE'

The post Mumford & Sons announce intimate 2025 nine-date club tour of UK, Europe, Australia and North America appeared first on NME .

;

Mumford & Sons have shared the details of an intimate nine-date club tour of UK, Europe, Australia and North America, set to kick off in March.

The newly announced gigs will mark Marcus Mumford and co's first string of headline live dates in the UK and Europe since 2018. The band will commence the tour on March 5 at Melkweg in Amsterdam. From there, they will make stops in Paris, London, Sydney, Los Angeles, Chicago and Toronto before wrapping up the shows at Brooklyn Paramount in New York on March 26.

Those who are members of Agora – the band's fan community – will have access to a ticket pre-sale available for the community members starting Thursday February 13. Anyone interested in the pre-sale should register for Agora here before Monday (February 10) at 11:59pm GMT.

General ticket sales will commence on Friday February 14 at 10am local time. Check out a full list of dates below and visit here to purchase UK tickets, here for US tickets.

在Instagram上查看此帖子

A post shared by Mumford & Sons (@mumfordandsons)

Mumford & Sons 2025 intimate club tour dates are:

行进
5 – Amsterdam, NL, Melkweg
7 – Paris, FR, Elysee Montmatre
9 – Berlin, DE—Metropol
11 – London, UK, O2 Forum Kentish Town
17 – Sydney, AU, Sydney Opera House
20 – Los Angeles, CA, Hollywood Palladium
22 – Chicago, IL, The Chicago Theatre
23 – Toronto, ON, Allied Music Centre – Massey Hall
26 – New York, NY, Brooklyn Paramount

Mumford & Sons have also partnered with PLUS1 to support War Child .每张出售票的$ 1都将帮助战争儿童保护，教育和支持受战争影响的儿童的权利。

Last month, the band shared their comeback track 'RUSHMERE' from their forthcoming album of the same name . It will mark their first LP in seven years and will be released on March 28 via Island/Glassnote, following on from 2018's 'Delta' ( pre-order/pre-save here ).

'RUSHMERE' also marks Mumford & Sons' first album as a trio, comprising of frontman Marcus Mumford, Ted Dwane and Ben Lovett. Banjoist Winston Marshall departed the group in 2021 , after facing backlash for praising a book by right-wing US journalist Andy Ngo .

Accoridng to a press release, Rushmere is the spot where it all began for the band. The pond, located on Wimbledon Common in south-west London, is where Mumford, Lovett, and Dwane first hung out and imagined the initial idea of putting a band together.拉什米尔（Rushmere）和他们演奏的乐器一样熟悉，并且是他们起源故事的核心。

在Instagram上查看此帖子

A post shared by Mumford & Sons (@mumfordandsons)

Produced by nine-time Grammy award winner Dave Cobb, 'RUSHMERE' follows an intense period of creativity for the trio and was recorded at RCA Studio A in Nashville, in Savannah, GA, and back in the UK at Marcus' studio in Devon.

Other songs set to appear on the album are 'Malibou', 'Monochrome', 'Truth' and 'Blood On The Page', the latter of which features Californian singer-songwriter Madison Cunningham. Their Pharrell-featuring 2024 song ' Good People' does not appear on the tracklist.

Speaking about the prospect of releasing new material in an interview in early 2024, Lovett said: “It just feels so great to be sharing new music again after all these years.”

Mumford added: “I think we always felt like we knew we were going to release some more music, but we wanted to wait for the right music. We've never been in haste, I don't think. But when this music came around, we had a sense of urgency.”

Dwane explained that they had “a lot of songs kicking around” at the time, and said the group were “really excited”.

In other news, Mumford & Sons are set to join forces with the likes of David Byrne , Jack White , Chris Martin and Lady Gaga in celebration of 50 years of Saturday Night Live as part of SNL: The Homecoming Concert at Radio City Hall, New York .

; 'The Simpsons' actor Hank Azaria expects AI will replace him soon: “It makes me sad to think about” https://www.nme.com/news/tv/the-simpsons-actor-hank-azaria-expects-ai-will-replace-him-soon-it-makes-me-sad-to-think-about-3835712?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=the-simpsons-actor-hank-azaria-expects-ai-will-replace-him-soon-it-makes-me-sad-to-think-aboutVictoria Luxford Thu, 06 Feb 2025 16:43:27 +0000 NewsTV News https://www.nme.com/?p=3835712

“A voice is not just a sound”

The post 'The Simpsons' actor Hank Azaria expects AI will replace him soon: “It makes me sad to think about” appeared first on NME .

;

The Simpsons voice actor Hank Azaria has written about his fears about being replaced by AI, and how the art of voice acting is much more than replicating a sound.

  • READ MORE: Five surprising secrets we learned from the 1995 'Simpsons' sketches

In an op-ed for The New York Times , Azaria, who voices bartender Moe, Chief Wiggum, and Comic Book Guy among other characters on the show, talked of his sadness that his years of work on the show may result in AI taking over从他那里。

He wrote: “I imagine that soon enough, artificial intelligence will be able to recreate the sounds of the more than 100 voices I created for characters on The Simpsons over almost four decades.想到它让我很难过。 Not to mention, it seems just plain wrong to steal my likeness or sound — or anyone else's”.

He used the example of Moe as an example: “AI could have access to 36 years of Moe, the permanently disgruntled bartender. He's appeared in just about every episode of The Simpsons . He's been terrified, in love, hit in the head and, most often, in a state of bitter hatred. I've laughed as Moe in dozens of ways by now. I've probably sighed as Moe 100 times. In terms of training AI, that's a lot to work with”.

He went on to say that, despite these resources, the human element of vocal performance is what makes the characters unique.他说：“声音不仅仅是声音。” “I'd like to think that no matter how much an AI version of Moe or Snake or Chief Wiggum will sound like my voice, something will still be missing — the humanness. There's so much of who I am that goes into creating a voice”.

He also mentioned the physical aspects of his work on the show, saying: “A misconception about voice acting is that it takes only a voice.但是我们的身体和灵魂参与了适当的可信度。 It can be as simple as running in place if your character's running. If your character is crying, you work up real tears, real emotion”.

Despite his sadness, Azaria concluded his piece on an optimistic note. “It's the neck-up version that I can see AI being capable of, at least right now” he said. “The body and soul part will be harder”.

Last year, Azaria went on the road performing with his Bruce Springsteen tribute act, Hank Azaria & The EZ Street Band .在此之前，他还评论了他何时觉得辛普森一家会结束。

The post 'The Simpsons' actor Hank Azaria expects AI will replace him soon: “It makes me sad to think about” appeared first on NME .

邮政冲刺，大型特别的，左派的未来，在2000年2025年的45个新名称中， NME首先出现在NME上。

2025年的2000年阵容中添加了许多新名称，包括Sprints ， Big Special等。找出下面的详细信息。

7月9日（星期三）至7月12日星期六，现场活动定于7月9日至星期六之间返回切尔滕纳姆附近的Upcote Farm。

新公告是在十月确认的第一波艺术家之后，当时音乐节历史上的第一次组织者同时宣布了所有头条新闻。其中包括Kneecap ， Pvris ， Take Sunday ， Coheed和Cambria ， Alexisonfire ，Million Dead， Kid Kapichi ， Bambie Thug ， Gel ， Røry等。

现在，该法案已添加了45个新名称，其中包括苏格兰二人组Vukovi和爱尔兰车库朋克乐队Sprints - 每个人都是牢固的节日最爱，并在2025年的账单上提高了账单。

Vukovi的Janine说：“自上次参加2000年以来已经两年了，在主舞台上扮演的主要位置对我们来说是如此正确。” “最好的节日，声音的人和热情的粉丝。”

伯明翰朋克二人组合大型特别节目也已宣布为2025年的分期付款，威尔士后铁杆乐队Future of the Leuth ，UK Dance-Punk Group Snayx，Indie Quintet Panic Shack和Metal-Pop Band Blood Command。

@vukoviband ， @sprintsmusic ， @dangericsummer ， @bigspecial_ ，婴儿宽面条和40个现象乐队正在加入2000年的2025年阵容！

- 2025年2月6日， 2000年的节日（@2000年）

加入2025年阵容的其他新名称包括Rising UK Acts Vower，Meryl Streek和Unveople。

“我们有信心我们倒数第二个宣布Cements 2000trees 2025，这是今年夏天的摇滚音乐节，” 2000年的Booker Booker James Scarlett说。 “这是您不仅看到场景中一些最令人兴奋的名字和绝对传说的地方之一，而且还看到了一个带有'您最喜欢的乐队'的底卡。”

“像Vukovi这样的艺术家已经在2000年的历史中编织了八年多，因此很高兴看到他们踏上了主要舞台上最大的老虎机之一，以及像Sprints这样的乐队，您可以在我们最小的舞台上找到只有两个几年前，现在是我们的第二阶段的头条新闻。”
